column5: I have started a blog. I'm not sure why, I just felt the need to jump full into the social media. http://ontariooutdooradventure.blogspot.com/  Does anyone else on OFC blog about topics, fishing or otherwise?  Good excuse to research topics that I find interesting and write about them. If nothing else I might expand a few into full articles and get back into outdoor writing.      For some reason the edit program will not let me type O F N. Changes to OFC.
nice,but I don't know if I would want too many pictures of Ron on there!LOL

I'm writing a blog for the local paper. No pay involved. They want me to write more and try to do it on the same days of the week. This supposedly generates more interest. My son told me to blog like a social media entry instead of me trying to write magazine articles all of the time. The articles are in my head but don't get on paper often enough. It's a constant juggling match with myself.
Really nice job, I'll be sure to check back often!

Thanks Guys.  http://ontariooutdooradventure.blogspot.com/2012/01/taking-good-fish-photos.html  I'm off to the Dominican Republic for some saltwater fishing so the Ontario Outdoor adventure blog may contain some offshore saltwater info soon.
It is so nice to see someone working so hard to get kids and families out fishing, good on you my friend!
